title: Mobile Design Pattern Gallery.pdf
description:
When you're under pressure to produce a well designed, easy-to-navigate mobile app, there's no time to reinvent the wheel. This concise book provides a handy reference to 70 mobile app design patterns, illustrated by more than 400 screenshots from current iOS, Android, BlackBerry, WebOS, Windows Mobile, and Symbian apps.

User experience professional Theresa Neil (Designing Web Interfaces) walks you through design patterns in 10 separate categories, including anti-patterns. Whether you're designing a simple iPhone application or one thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s meant to work for every popular mobile OS on the market, these patterns provide solutions to common design challenges. This print edition is in full color
